item.title: Wonderland
item.dc:creator: danpoynoradmin
item.description: Whimsical design with blue, green, and brown on Ivory Linen, paired with a complementary Blue Linen. 24 x 24 Silk Invisible Zipper Closure for Easy Care Fully-lined Premium Inserts Hand made in the USA

item.title: Terra
item.dc:creator: danpoynoradmin
item.description: Stunning Terra Cotta and Gold Bronze Silk Motif, paired with a Rich Terra Cotta Solid Silk Taffeta. 20 X 20 Silk Invisible Zipper Closure for Easy Care Fully-lined Premium Inserts Hand made in the USA

item.title: Tangerine
item.dc:creator: danpoynoradmin
item.description: Tangerine Orange Pleated Silk paired with a Gorgeous Turquoise Silk with Tangerine Orange Stripes. 14 x 21 Silk Invisible Zipper Closure for Easy Care Fully-lined Premium Inserts Hand made in the USA

item.title: Peacock
item.dc:creator: danpoynoradmin
item.description: Exotic Peacock-pattern Brocade finished with a dainty cording and paired with Light Gray Silk Dupioni. 26 X 26 Silk Invisible Zipper Closure for Easy Care Fully-lined Premium Inserts Hand made in the USA

item.title: Orange Mist
item.dc:creator: danpoynoradmin
item.description: Orange 100% Cotton with subtle hues of light and dark orange, paired with Exquisite Silk Cotton. 18 x 18 Silk Invisible Zipper Closure for Easy Care Fully-lined Premium Inserts Hand made in the USA

item.title: Old Spice
item.dc:creator: danpoynoradmin
item.description: Ivory Silk Flower Embroidered pattern paired with an Apple Green Velvet backing and complemented with two trims- a fringe and dangling tassels. 14 x 21 Silk Invisible Zipper Closure for Easy Care Fully-lined Premium Inserts Hand made in the USA

item.title: Nile
item.dc:creator: danpoynoradmin
item.description: Exquisite and Exotic combination of Sage, Gold, Light Blue/Green and Gray Silk, paired with a Light Sage Silk backing. 22 X 22 Silk Invisible Zipper Closure for Easy Care Fully-lined Premium Inserts Hand made in the USA

item.title: Ripple
item.dc:creator: danpoynoradmin
item.description: 100% Cotton Rippling Folds with Tone-on-Tone in Olive Green, paired with Exquisite Cotton/Silk in Butterscotch. 20×20 Cotton Invisible Zipper Closure for Easy Care Fully-lined Premium Inserts Hand made in the USA

item.title: Riptide
item.dc:creator: danpoynoradmin
item.description: Stunning Red Silk Brocade Lounge Pillow with Silvery White Swirls, delicate cording and paired with a Red Silk Dupioni. 26 x 26 Silk Invisible Zipper Closure for Easy Care Fully-lined Premium Inserts Hand made in the USA

item.title: Wave
item.dc:creator: danpoynoradmin
item.description: Silk brocade, lime waves with small purple bubbles, paired with a Shimmering Silk, Pink Popsicle Dupioni. 16 x 26 Silk Invisible Zipper Closure for Easy Care Fully-lined Premium Inserts Hand made in the USA

item.title: Flying Feathers
item.dc:creator: danpoynoradmin
item.description: Stunning Silk Brocade Lounge Pillow with an array of Flying Feathers — just gorgeous. Paired with a Shimmering, Smooth Light-Gold Silk Dupioni. 28 x 28 Silk Invisible Zipper Closure for Easy Care Fully-lined Premium Inserts Hand made in the USA

item.title: Aquila
item.dc:creator: danpoynoradmin
item.description: Exotic Black Silk Brocade with Metallic Gold, Red, and Turquoise. Paired with a stunning Blue Turquoise Silk Dupioni. 20×20 Cotton Invisible Zipper Closure for Easy Care Fully-lined Premium Inserts Hand made in the USA

item.title: Midnight Stroll
item.dc:creator: danpoynoradmin
item.description: Alaska Sky-Blue Silk Brocade with dainty shimmering gold-flowering vines finished with subtle cording and paired with a Shimmering Gold Silk Dupioni. 18 x 18 Cotton Invisible Zipper Closure for Easy Care Fully-lined Premium Inserts Hand made in the USA

item.title: Tea Garden
item.dc:creator: danpoynoradmin
item.description: Elegant Black Silk Brocade with Pink and Fuchsia flower clusters, delicate cording paired with a rich and vibrant Fuchsia Velvet. 24 x 24 Cotton Invisible Zipper Closure for Easy Care Fully-lined Premium Inserts Hand made in the USA
